    • Method Detail

      • loadTexture

        public static Texture2D loadTexture(java.lang.String file,
                                    float lodBias,
                                    boolean anisotropyEnabled,
                                    float anisotropyAmount,
                                    boolean forceUnique)
                             throws java.io.IOException
        Load a PNG texture
        Parameters:
        file - The file to load
        lodBias - The texture level of detail bias
        anisotropyEnabled - Wether anisotropic filtering should be enabled
        anisotropyAmount - The maximum amount of anisotropy
        forceUnique - If true make sure the texture isn't just a new reference to a cached texture
        Returns:
        The texture that was loaded
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If the texture failed to load
